snippet: The announcement coincided with the annual Muslim pilgrimage to Mecca. The report suggested precautions for travelers to Saudi Arabia to minimize risk of exposure to MERS.
abstract: World Health Organization and other health authorities say there is little reason to fear that annual Muslim pilgrimage to Mecca will spread MERS virus widely around the world; authorities emphasize vigilance is still important.
lead_paragraph: The announcement coincided with the annual Muslim pilgrimage to Mecca. The report suggested precautions for travelers to Saudi Arabia to minimize risk of exposure to MERS.

headline.main: Mideast Virus MERS Merits Caution, Not Alarm, W.H.O. Says
headline.print_headline: Mideast Virus Merits Caution, Not Alarm, W.H.O. Says
